enumeratedValue.name: PHASE0
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 0.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE1
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 1.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE2
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 2.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE3
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 3.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE4
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 4.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE5
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 5.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE6
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 6.

enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 7.

enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 9.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE10
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 10.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE11
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 11.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE12
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 12.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE13
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 13.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE15
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 15.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Phase Select. The ADC will always sample on the start-of-conversion trigger selected by the SCSEL field.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Phase Select. The ADC will sample according to the phase selected by the SPSEL field.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the SAR clock output to SSG.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC is the SSG master, and the SAR clock will be output to the SSG block.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Data is written to the upper half-word and the lower half-word is filled with 0's. An SCI interrupt is triggered when data is written, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Data is written to the lower half-word, and the upper half-word is filled with 0's. An SCI interrupt is triggered when data is written, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER_FIRST
enumeratedValue.description: Two data words are packed into the register with the upper half-word representing the earlier data, and the lower half-word representing the later data. If SIMCEN is set to 1, the upper half-word represents data from the master ADC (selected by SSGEN) and the lower half-word represents data from the slave ADC. The ADC write to the lower half-word will trigger the SCI interrupt, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_FIRST
enumeratedValue.description: Two data words are packed into the register with the lower half-word representing the earlier data, and the upper half-word representing the later data. If SIMCEN is set to 1, the lower half-word represents data from the master ADC (selected by SSGEN) and the upper half-word represents data from the slave ADC. The ADC write to the upper half-word will trigger the SCI interrupt, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable simultaneous mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable simultaneous mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable interleaved mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable interleaved mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable ADC scan mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable ADC scan mode. The ADC will scan through the defined time slots in sequence on every start of conversion.

enumeratedValue.name: ONCE
enumeratedValue.description: The channel sequencer will cycle through all of the specified time slots once.

enumeratedValue.name: LOOP
enumeratedValue.description: The channel sequencer will cycle through all of the specified time slots in a loop until SCANEN is cleared to 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC module DMA interface.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC module DMA interface.

enumeratedValue.name: LPOSC0
enumeratedValue.description: Burst mode uses the Low Power Oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Burst mode uses the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC single data conversion complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC single data conversion complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC scan complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC scan complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The internal device ground is used as the ground reference for ADC conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The VREFGND pin is used as the ground reference for ADC conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: Select the rising edge of the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: Select the falling edge of the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT0
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT0 ("On Demand" by writing 1 to ADBUSY) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT1
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT1 (Timer 0 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT2
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT2 (Timer 0 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT3
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT3 (Timer 1 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT4
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT4 (Timer 1 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT5
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT5 (EPCA0 synchronization pulse) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT6
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT6 (I2C0 Timer overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT7
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT7 (I2C1 Timer overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT8
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT8 (SSG phase defined by ADSP bits) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT9
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT9 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT10
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT10 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT11
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT11 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT12
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT12 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT13
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT13 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT14
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT14 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT15
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT15 (PB0.12) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC (low-power shutdown).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC (active and ready for data conversions).

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC re-samples the input before each of the four conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples once before the first conversion and converts four times.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the common mode buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the common mode buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ACCUMULATE
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions will be accumulated for the specified number of cycles in burst mode according to the channel configuration.

enumeratedValue.name: REPEAT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions will not be accumulated in burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Normal Tracking Mode: When the ADC is enabled, a conversion begins immediately following the start-of-conversion signal.

enumeratedValue.name: DELAYED
enumeratedValue.description: Delayed Tracking Mode: When the ADC is enabled, a conversion begins 3 SAR clock cycles following the start-of-conversion signal. The ADC is allowed to track during this time.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 0. Recommended to use modes 1, 2, or 3.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 1 (SARCLK = 16 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 3 (SARCLK = 4 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable low power mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable low power mode (requires extended tracking time).

field.name: MREFLPEN
field.description: MUX and VREF Low Power Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable low power mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable low power mode (SAR clock <= 4 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL_VREF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the internal, dedicated SARADC voltage reference as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: VDD
enumeratedValue.description: Select the VDD pin as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: LDO_OUT
enumeratedValue.description: Select the output of the internal LDO regulator (~1.8 V) as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL_VREF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the VREF pin as the ADC reference. This option is used for either an external VREF or the on-chip VREF driving out to the VREF pin.

enumeratedValue.description: Select conversion characteristic 0 for time slot 4.

enumeratedValue.description: Select conversion characteristic 3 for time slot 4.

enumeratedValue.description: Disable window comparison interrupts.

enumeratedValue.description: Enabled window comparison interrupts. The window comparator will be used to check the ADC result on channels that use this characteristic.

field.name: CHR1WCIEN
field.description: Conversion Characteristic 1 Window Comparator Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable window comparison interrupts.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled window comparison interrupts. The window comparator will be used to check the ADC result on channels that use this characteristic.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A window compare interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A window compare interrupt occurred. Write: Force a window compare interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A single data conversion interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A single data conversion interrupt occurred. Write: Force a single data conversion interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A scan done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A scan done interrupt occurred. Write: Force a scan done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO overrun interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO overrun interrupt occurred. Write: Force a data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO underrun interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO underrun interrupt occurred. Write: Force a data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER
enumeratedValue.description: The next ADC conversion will be written to the lower half-word.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER
enumeratedValue.description: The next ADC conversion will be written to the upper half-word.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: New data is not produced yet.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: New data is ready.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE0
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 0.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE1
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 1.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE2
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 2.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE3
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 3.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE4
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 4.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE5
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 5.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE6
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 6.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE7
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 7.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE8
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 8.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE9
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 9.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE10
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 10.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE11
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 11.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE12
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 12.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE13
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 13.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE14
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 14.

enumeratedValue.name: PHASE15
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples at SSG phase 15.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Phase Select. The ADC will always sample on the start-of-conversion trigger selected by the SCSEL field.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Phase Select. The ADC will sample according to the phase selected by the SPSEL field.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the SAR clock output to SSG.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC is the SSG master, and the SAR clock will be output to the SSG block.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Data is written to the upper half-word and the lower half-word is filled with 0's. An SCI interrupt is triggered when data is written, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Data is written to the lower half-word, and the upper half-word is filled with 0's. An SCI interrupt is triggered when data is written, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER_FIRST
enumeratedValue.description: Two data words are packed into the register with the upper half-word representing the earlier data, and the lower half-word representing the later data. If SIMCEN is set to 1, the upper half-word represents data from the master ADC (selected by SSGEN) and the lower half-word represents data from the slave ADC. The ADC write to the lower half-word will trigger the SCI interrupt, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER_FIRST
enumeratedValue.description: Two data words are packed into the register with the lower half-word representing the earlier data, and the upper half-word representing the later data. If SIMCEN is set to 1, the lower half-word represents data from the master ADC (selected by SSGEN) and the upper half-word represents data from the slave ADC. The ADC write to the upper half-word will trigger the SCI interrupt, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable simultaneous mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable simultaneous mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable interleaved mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable interleaved mode conversion packing.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable ADC scan mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable ADC scan mode. The ADC will scan through the defined time slots in sequence on every start of conversion.

enumeratedValue.name: ONCE
enumeratedValue.description: The channel sequencer will cycle through all of the specified time slots once.

enumeratedValue.name: LOOP
enumeratedValue.description: The channel sequencer will cycle through all of the specified time slots in a loop until SCANEN is cleared to 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC module DMA interface.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC module DMA interface.

enumeratedValue.name: LPOSC0
enumeratedValue.description: Burst mode uses the Low Power Oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Burst mode uses the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC single data conversion complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC single data conversion complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC scan complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC scan complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The internal device ground is used as the ground reference for ADC conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The VREFGND pin is used as the ground reference for ADC conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: Select the rising edge of the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: Select the falling edge of the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT0
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT0 ("On Demand" by writing 1 to ADBUSY) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT1
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT1 (Timer 0 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT2
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT2 (Timer 0 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT3
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT3 (Timer 1 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT4
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT4 (Timer 1 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT5
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT5 (EPCA0 synchronization pulse) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT6
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT6 (I2C0 Timer overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT7
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT7 (I2C1 Timer overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT8
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT8 (SSG phase defined by ADSP bits) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT9
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT9 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT10
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT10 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT11
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT11 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT12
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT12 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT13
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT13 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT14
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT14 (RESERVED) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCNT15
enumeratedValue.description: An ADC conversion triggers from the ADCnT15 (PB0.13) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the ADC (low-power shutdown).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the ADC (active and ready for data conversions).

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC re-samples the input before each of the four conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: The ADC samples once before the first conversion and converts four times.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the common mode buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the common mode buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ACCUMULATE
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions will be accumulated for the specified number of cycles in burst mode according to the channel configuration.

enumeratedValue.name: REPEAT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions will not be accumulated in burst mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Normal Tracking Mode: When the ADC is enabled, a conversion begins immediately following the start-of-conversion signal.

enumeratedValue.name: DELAYED
enumeratedValue.description: Delayed Tracking Mode: When the ADC is enabled, a conversion begins 3 SAR clock cycles following the start-of-conversion signal. The ADC is allowed to track during this time.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 0. Recommended to use modes 1, 2, or 3.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 1 (SARCLK = 16 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Select bias current mode 3 (SARCLK = 4 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable low power mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable low power mode (requires extended tracking time).

field.name: MREFLPEN
field.description: MUX and VREF Low Power Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable low power mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable low power mode (SAR clock <= 4 MHz).

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL_VREF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the internal, dedicated SARADC voltage reference as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: VDD
enumeratedValue.description: Select the VDD pin as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: LDO_OUT
enumeratedValue.description: Select the output of the internal LDO regulator (~1.8 V) as the ADC reference.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL_VREF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the VREF pin as the ADC reference. This option is used for either an external VREF or the on-chip VREF driving out to the VREF pin.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled window comparison interrupts. The window comparator will be used to check the ADC result on channels that use this characteristic.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A window compare interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A window compare interrupt occurred. Write: Force a window compare interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A single data conversion interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A single data conversion interrupt occurred. Write: Force a single data conversion interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A scan done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A scan done interrupt occurred. Write: Force a scan done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO overrun interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO overrun interrupt occurred. Write: Force a data FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO underrun interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data FIFO underrun interrupt occurred. Write: Force a data FIFO underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: LOWER
enumeratedValue.description: The next ADC conversion will be written to the lower half-word.

enumeratedValue.name: UPPER
enumeratedValue.description: The next ADC conversion will be written to the upper half-word.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: New data is not produced yet.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: New data is ready.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start the AES operation.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable key capture.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable key capture.

enumeratedValue.name: DECRYPT
enumeratedValue.description: AES module performs a decryption operation

enumeratedValue.name: ENCRYPT
enumeratedValue.description: AES module performs an encryption operation.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable software mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable software mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not bypass AES operations.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass AES operations.

enumeratedValue.name: XOR_DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the XOR paths.

enumeratedValue.name: XOR_INPUT
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the XOR input path, disable the XOR output path.

enumeratedValue.name: XOR_OUTPUT
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the XOR input path, enable the XOR output path.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable hardware counter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable hardware counter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable hardware cipher-block chaining (CBC) mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable hardware cipher-block chaining (CBC) mode.

enumeratedValue.name: KEY128
enumeratedValue.description: Key is composed of 128 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: KEY192
enumeratedValue.description: Key is composed of 192 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: KEY256
enumeratedValue.description: Key is composed of 256 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the operation complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the operation complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the AES module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The AES module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: AES module is not in soft reset.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: AES module is in soft reset and none of the module bits can be accessed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: No input/output data FIFO underrun.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An input/output data FIFO underrun has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: No input/output data FIFO overrun.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An input/output data FIFO overrun has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: No XOR data FIFO overrun.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: An XOR data FIFO overrun has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: Input/Output data FIFO is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: 1WORD
enumeratedValue.description: Input/Output data FIFO contains 1 word.

enumeratedValue.name: 2WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: Input/Output data FIFO contains 2 words.

enumeratedValue.name: 3WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: Input/Output data FIFO contains 3 words.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: Input/Output data FIFO contains 4 words (full).

enumeratedValue.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: XOR data FIFO is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: 1WORD
enumeratedValue.description: XOR data FIFO contains 1 word.

enumeratedValue.name: 2WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: XOR data FIFO contains 2 words.

enumeratedValue.name: 3WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: XOR data FIFO contains 3 words.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: XOR data FIFO contains 4 words (full).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES module is not busy.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES module is completing an operation.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES error interrupt has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES error interrupt has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES operation complete interrupt has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: AES operation complete interrupt occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not initialize the CRC module to the value set by the SEED bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Initialize the CRC module to the value set by the SEED bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_ZEROES
enumeratedValue.description: CRC seed value is all 0's (0x00000000)

enumeratedValue.name: ALL_ONES
enumeratedValue.description: CRC seed value is all 1's (0xFFFFFFFF).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable CRC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable CRC operations.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC_32_04C11DB7
enumeratedValue.description: Select 32-bit polynomial: 0x04C11DB7.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC_16_1021
enumeratedValue.description: Select 16-bit polynomial: 0x1021.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC_16_3D65
enumeratedValue.description: Select 16-bit polynomial: 0x3D65.

enumeratedValue.name: CRC_16_8005
enumeratedValue.description: Select 16-bit polynomial: 0x8005.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable byte mode (word/byte width is determined automatically by the hardware).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable byte mode (all writes are considered as bytes).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: No byte-level bit reversal (input is same order as written).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Byte-level bit reversal enabled (the bits in each byte are reversed).

enumeratedValue.name: NO_REORDER
enumeratedValue.description: No byte reorientation (output is same order as input).

enumeratedValue.name: BIG_ENDIAN_16
enumeratedValue.description: Swap for 16-bit big endian order (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B2 B3 B0 B1).

enumeratedValue.name: BIG_ENDIAN_32
enumeratedValue.description: Swap for 32-bit big endian order (input: B3 B2 B1 B0, output: B0 B1 B2 B3).

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A capacitive sensing conversion is complete or a conversion is not currently in progress. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A capacitive sensing conversion is in progress. Write: Initiate a capacitive sensing conversion if BUSYF is selected as the start of conversion source.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the capacitive sensing module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the capacitive sensing module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the bias.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the bias.

enumeratedValue.name: GT
enumeratedValue.description: The digital comparator generates an interrupt if the conversion is greater than the CSTH threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: LTE
enumeratedValue.description: The digital comparator generates an interrupt if the conversion is less than or equal to the CSTH threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: SINGLE
enumeratedValue.description: Single Conversion Mode: One conversion occurs on a single channel.

enumeratedValue.name: SCAN
enumeratedValue.description: Single Scan Mode: One conversion on each channel selected by SCANEN occurs. An end-of-scan interrupt indicates all channels have been measured.

enumeratedValue.name: CONT_SINGLE
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous Single Conversion Mode: Continuously converts on a single channel. This operation ends only if the module is disabled (CSEN = 0) or if a compare threshold event occurs (CMPI = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: CONT_SCAN
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous Scan Mode: Continuously loops through and converts on all the channels selected by SCANEN. This operation ends only if the module is disabled (CSEN = 0) or if a compare threshold event occurs (CMPI = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: 12BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions last 12 internal CAPSENSE clocks and results are 12 bits in length.

enumeratedValue.name: 13BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions last 13 internal CAPSENSE clocks and results are 13 bits in length.

enumeratedValue.name: 14BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions last 14 internal CAPSENSE clocks and results are 14 bits in length.

enumeratedValue.name: 16BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Conversions last 16 internal CAPSENSE clocks and results are 16 bits in length.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_1
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 1 sample.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_4
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 4 samples.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_8
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 8 samples.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_16
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 16 samples.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_32
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 32 samples.

enumeratedValue.name: ACC_64
enumeratedValue.description: Accumulate 64 samples.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the multiple channel measurement feature.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the multiple channel measurement feature.

enumeratedValue.description: The CSnT0 ("On Demand" by writing 1 to CSBUSY) trigger source starts conversions.

enumeratedValue.name: CSNT6

enumeratedValue.name: CSNT7

enumeratedValue.name: CSNT8

enumeratedValue.name: ALWAYS_RETRY
enumeratedValue.description: Always retry on a pin state change.

enumeratedValue.name: RETRY_TWICE
enumeratedValue.description: Retry up to twice on consecutive bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: RETRY_FOUR_TIMES
enumeratedValue.description: Retry up to four times on consecutive bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: DO_NOT_RETRY
enumeratedValue.description: Ignore monitored signal state change.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A retry did not occur due to a pin monitor event during the last conversion.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A retry occurred due to a pin monitor event during the last conversion.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the single scan end-of-scan interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET

enumeratedValue.description: The capacitive sensing result caused a compare threshold interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The CAPSENSEn module has not completed a data conversion since the last time CDI was cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The CAPSENSEn module completed a data conversion. Write: Force a conversion complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The CAPSENSEn module has not completed a scan since the last time EOSI was cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The CAPSENSEn module completed a scan.

enumeratedValue.name: DIRECT
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the NMUX signal to CP- and the PMUX signal to CP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPP_VSS
enumeratedValue.description: Connects VSS to CP- and the PMUX signal to CP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPP_DAC
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the NMUX signal to CP-, the PMUX signal to the Comparator DAC voltage reference, and the DAC output to CP+.

enumeratedValue.name: CMPN_DAC
enumeratedValue.description: Connects the PMUX signal to CP+, the NMUX signal to the Comparator DAC voltage reference, and the DAC output to CP-.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 3 (slowest response time, lowest power consumption).

field.name: HDOSEL
field.description: High Drive Port Bank Output Select.

enumeratedValue.name: THREE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select three differential outputs from Channels 3, 4, and 5 for the High Drive pins.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential outputs from Channels 4 and 5 and non-differential outputs from Channels 2 and 3 for the High Drive pins.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential output from Channel 5 and non-differential outputs from Channels 1-4 for the High Drive pins.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the non-differential channel outputs (Channels 0-5) for the High Drive pins.

enumeratedValue.name: CH0

enumeratedValue.name: CH1

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA channel is not servicing an EPCA control transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA channel is busy servicing an EPCA control transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the non-differential channel outputs (Channels 0-5) for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential output from Channel 2 and non-differential outputs from Channels 0, 1, 3, and 4 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select the differential outputs from Channels 1 and 2 and non-differential outputs from Channels 0 and 3 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: THREE_DIFF
enumeratedValue.description: Select three differential outputs from Channels 0, 1, and 2 for the standard PB pins.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EPCA counter overflow/limit event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EPCA counter overflow/limit event interrupt.

field.name: OVFDEN
field.description: EPCA Counter Overflow/Limit DMA Request Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not request DMA data when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Request DMA data when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

field.name: OVFSEN
field.description: EPCA Counter Overflow/Limit Synchronization Signal Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send a synchronization signal when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send a synchronization signal when a EPCA counter overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate an interrupt if the EPCA halt input is high.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Generate an interrupt if the EPCA halt input is high.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA registers will automatically load any new update values after an overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA registers will not load any new update values after an overflow/limit event occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA module will stop running when the core halts (idle).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA module will continue normal operation when the core halts (idle).

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will stop the EPCA counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The EPCA will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The Halt input (PB_HDKill) does not affect the EPCA counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: An assertion of the Halt input (PB_HDKill) will stop the EPCA counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT0
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 0, EPCAnT0 (Comparator 0 Output).

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT1
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 1, EPCAnT1 (Comparator 1 Output).

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT2
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 2, EPCAnT2 (Timer 0 High Overflow ).

enumeratedValue.name: EPCANT3
enumeratedValue.description: Select input trigger 3, EPCAnT3 (Timer 1 High Overflow).

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: A high-to-low transition (falling edge) on EPCAnTx will start the counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: A low-to-high transition (rising edge) on EPCAnTx will start the counter/timer.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input trigger (EPCAnTx). The EPCA counter/timer will continue to run if the RUN bit is set regardless of the value on the input trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input trigger (EPCAnTx). If RUN is set to 1, the EPCA counter/timer will start running when the selected input trigger (STSEL) meets the criteria set by STESEL. It will not stop running if the criteria is no longer met.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The clock divider is currently in the first half-cycle.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The clock divider is currently in the second half-cycle.

enumeratedValue.description: A Channel 0 match or capture event occurred.

enumeratedValue.description: A Channel 5 match or capture event did not occur.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.description: Stop the EPCA Counter/Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.description: An EPCA register update has not completed and is still pending.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NO_CHANGE
enumeratedValue.description: Capture/Compare, overflow, or intermediate events do not control the output state.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the differential signal generator. The channel will output a single non-differential output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the differential signal generator. The channel will output two differential outputs: X Phase (XPH) and Y Phase (YPH).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the Flash at speed mode 0.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the Flash at speed mode 1.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the Flash at speed mode 2.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Read and write the Flash at speed mode 3.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable read store mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable read store mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Data accesses are excluded from the prefetch buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Data accesses are included in the prefetch buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Any reads from Flash are prefetched until the prefetch buffer is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Inhibit the prefetch engine.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable sequential write mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable sequential write mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the WRDATA field will initiate a write to Flash at the address in the WRADDR field.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the WRDATA field will initiate an erase of the Flash page containing the address in the WRADDR field.

enumeratedValue.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: The Flash controller write data buffer is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: The Flash controller write data buffer is full.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The Flash interface is not busy.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The Flash interface is busy with an operation.

enumeratedValue.name: SLOW
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the Flash read controller for AHB clocks below 20 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: FAST
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the Flash read controller for AHB clocks above 20 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is not currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK has not been received. Write: Do not send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK received. Write: Send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK has not been requested.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK requested.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop is not pending and a stop / repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STO bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop or stop / repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a stop.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A start is not pending and a repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STA bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a start or repeat start.

enumeratedValue.name: RECEIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in receiver mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TRANSMIT
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in transmitter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Slave mode.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Master mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the stop interrupt flag (STOI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop interrupt detected. In Slave mode, a stop has been detected on the bus. In Master mode, a stop has been generated. Write: Force a stop interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt occurred. Write: Force an acknowledge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the receive done interrupt (RXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Receive done interrupt occurred. Write: Force a receive done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the transmit done interrupt (TXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Transmit done interrupt detected. If the transmit is forced to abort by a NACK response, the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI) will also be set. Write: Force a transmit done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the start interrupt (STAI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start interrupt occurred. In Slave mode, a start or repeat start is detected. In Master mode, a start or repeat start has been generated.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An arbitration lost interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the arbitration lost interrupt (ARBLI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Arbitration lost interrupt detected. Write: Force an arbitration lost interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt (T0I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 0 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: No interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt (T1I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 1 overflow interrupt is detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt (T2I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 2 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt or SCL low timeout has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt (T3I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 3 overflow or SCL low timeout interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address reception.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a receive operation.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a transmit operation.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE_ADDRESS
enumeratedValue.description: Slave address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: GENERAL_CALL
enumeratedValue.description: General Call address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: If automatic hardware acknowledge mode is enabled (HACKEN = 1), automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The I2C module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the I2C module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Slave modes.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Inhibit Slave modes. The module will not respond to a Master on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic hardware acknowledge.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic hardware acknowledge.

enumeratedValue.name: 7BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Slave addresses are 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 10BIT
enumeratedValue.description: Slave addresses are 10 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: NACK after the last byte is received.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: ACK after the last byte is received.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable General Call address decoding.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable General Call address decoding.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is not in soft reset.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is in soft reset and firmware cannot access all bits in the module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C module.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the stop interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the stop interrupt (STOI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the acknowledge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive done interrupt (RXI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit done interrupt (TXI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the start interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the start interrupt (STAI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the arbitration lost interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the arbitration lost interrupt (ARBLI).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt (T0I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt (T1I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt (T2I).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C Timer Byte 3 and SCL low timeout interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2C Timer Byte 3 and SCL low timeout interrupt (T3I).

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 0 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 1.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 1 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 2.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 2 running.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop Timer Byte 3.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start Timer Byte 3 running.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 0: Operate the I2C timer as a single 32-bit timer : Timer Bytes [3 : 2 : 1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 1: Operate the I2C timer as two 16-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2] and Timer Bytes [1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 2: Operate the I2C timer as four independent 8-bit timers : Timer Byte 3, Timer Byte 2, Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 3: Operate the I2C timer as one 16-bit and two 8-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2], Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable I2C Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable I2C Timer for general purpose use. This setting should not be used when the I2C module is enabled (I2CEN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable I2C DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable I2C DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is not currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transaction is currently taking place.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK has not been received. Write: Do not send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: ACK received. Write: Send an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Arbitration lost error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK has not been requested.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: ACK requested.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop is not pending and a stop / repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STO bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop or stop / repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a stop.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A start is not pending and a repeat start has not been detected. Write: Clear the STA bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start detected. This bit must be cleared by firmware. Write: Generate a start or repeat start.

enumeratedValue.name: RECEIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in receiver mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TRANSMIT
enumeratedValue.description: Module is in transmitter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Slave mode.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER
enumeratedValue.description: Module is operating in Master mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stop interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the stop interrupt flag (STOI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Stop interrupt detected. In Slave mode, a stop has been detected on the bus. In Master mode, a stop has been generated. Write: Force a stop interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An acknowledge interrupt occurred. Write: Force an acknowledge interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the receive done interrupt (RXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Receive done interrupt occurred. Write: Force a receive done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit done interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the transmit done interrupt (TXI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Transmit done interrupt detected. If the transmit is forced to abort by a NACK response, the acknowledge interrupt (ACKI) will also be set. Write: Force a transmit done interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the start interrupt (STAI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Start or repeat start interrupt occurred. In Slave mode, a start or repeat start is detected. In Master mode, a start or repeat start has been generated.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An arbitration lost interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the arbitration lost interrupt (ARBLI).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Arbitration lost interrupt detected. Write: Force an arbitration lost interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt (T0I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 0 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: No interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt (T1I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 1 overflow interrupt is detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 1 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt (T2I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 2 overflow interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 2 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt or SCL low timeout has not occurred. Write: Clear the I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt (T3I).

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: I2C Timer Byte 3 overflow or SCL low timeout interrupt detected. Write: Force a I2C Timer Byte 3 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address reception.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a receive operation.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable data and address transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the module to perform a transmit operation.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE_ADDRESS
enumeratedValue.description: Slave address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: GENERAL_CALL
enumeratedValue.description: General Call address detected.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: If automatic hardware acknowledge mode is enabled (HACKEN = 1), automatically switch to transmit or receive mode after a Start.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the input filter.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The I2C module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the I2C module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Slave modes.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Inhibit Slave modes. The module will not respond to a Master on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic hardware acknowledge.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: 10BIT

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is not in soft reset.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C module is in soft reset and firmware cannot access all bits in the module.

enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2C module.
