enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 0: Operate the I2C timer as a single 32-bit timer : Timer Bytes [3 : 2 : 1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 1: Operate the I2C timer as two 16-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2] and Timer Bytes [1 : 0].

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 2: Operate the I2C timer as four independent 8-bit timers : Timer Byte 3, Timer Byte 2, Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Timer Mode 3: Operate the I2C timer as one 16-bit and two 8-bit timers : Timer Bytes [3 : 2], Timer Byte 1, and Timer Byte 0.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable I2C Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable I2C Timer for general purpose use. This setting should not be used when the I2C module is enabled (I2CEN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the internal DFS generator.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the internal DFS generator.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The internal DFS generator starts immediately when FSGEN is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Synchronize the rising edge of the internally generated WS signal from the DFS generator to the rising edge of the external WS input signal.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The first data bit is sent on the second or later rising edge of SCK after WS changes.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The first data bit is sent on the first rising edge of SCK after WS changes.

enumeratedValue.name: FSIN_EXT
enumeratedValue.description: The word select or frame sync is input from the WS pin.

enumeratedValue.name: FSIN_INT
enumeratedValue.description: The word select or frame sync is input from the internal DFS generator.

enumeratedValue.name: ZEROS
enumeratedValue.description: Send zeros during unused bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: ONES
enumeratedValue.description: Send ones during unused bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: SIGN
enumeratedValue.description: Send the sign bit of the current sample (MSB-first format) or last sample (LSB-first format) during unused bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: RANDOM
enumeratedValue.description: Send pseudo-random data generated by an 8-bit LFSR during unused bit cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: LEFT
enumeratedValue.description: Use left-justified or I2S-style formats.

enumeratedValue.name: RIGHT
enumeratedValue.description: Use right-justified format.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Don't invert the WS signal. Use this setting for I2S format.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the WS signal.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the transmitter bit clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the transmitter bit clock.

enumeratedValue.name: LEFT_RIGHT
enumeratedValue.description: Left sample transmitted first, right sample transmitted second. Use this setting for I2S format.

enumeratedValue.name: RIGHT_LEFT
enumeratedValue.description: Right sample transmitted first, left sample transmitted second.

enumeratedValue.name: 8BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits are sent per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 9BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits are sent per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 16BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 16 bits are sent per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 24BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 24 bits are sent per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 32BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 32 bits are sent per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2S transmitter.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2S transmitter.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Drive the output during every cycle of the transmitter's assigned slot(s), including the last clock cycle.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Drive the output for every cycle of the transmitter's assigned slot(s), except for the last clock cycle of the last slot.

enumeratedValue.name: ZERO
enumeratedValue.description: Drive zero on the data output pin during non-active slots.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH_Z
enumeratedValue.description: Don't drive the data output pin. The data output pin is tristated.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the time division multiplexing (TDM) feature.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the time division multiplexing (TDM) feature.

enumeratedValue.name: LEFT
enumeratedValue.description: Use left-justified or I2S-style formats.

enumeratedValue.name: RIGHT
enumeratedValue.description: Use right-justified format.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The first data bit is captured on the second or later rising edge of SCK after WS changes.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The first data bit is captured by the receiver on the first rising edge of SCK after WS changes.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Don't invert the WS signal. Use this setting for I2S format.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the WS signal.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the receiver bit clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the receiver bit clock.

enumeratedValue.name: LEFT_RIGHT
enumeratedValue.description: Left sample received first, right sample received second. Use this setting for I2S format.

enumeratedValue.name: RIGHT_LEFT
enumeratedValue.description: Right sample received first, left sample received second.

enumeratedValue.name: 8BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits are received per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 9BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits are received per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 16BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 16 bits are received per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 24BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 24 bits are received per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: 32BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 32 bits are received per mono sample.

enumeratedValue.name: FSIN_EXT
enumeratedValue.description: The word select or frame sync is input from the WS pin.

enumeratedValue.name: FSIN_INT
enumeratedValue.description: The word select or frame sync is input from the internal DFS generator.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2S receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2S receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the time division multiplexing (TDM) feature.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the time division multiplexing (TDM) feature.

enumeratedValue.name: MORE
enumeratedValue.description: When the division is fractional, the clock high time will be greater than 50% (by half of the source clock period).

enumeratedValue.name: LESS
enumeratedValue.description: When the division is fractional, the clock low time will be greater than 50% (by half of the source clock period).

enumeratedValue.name: UPDATE
enumeratedValue.description: Update the clock divider with new values of INTDIV, FRACDIV, and DIVEN.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the clock divider.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the clock divider.

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S transmitter is clocked from the internal clock divider.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S transmitter is clocked from the SCK pin.

enumeratedValue.name: INTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S receiver is clocked from the internal clock divider.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTERNAL
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S receiver is clocked from the SCK pin.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Reset the I2S module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2S receiver clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2S receiver clock.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the I2S transmitter clock.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the I2S transmitter clock.

enumeratedValue.name: SCK_OUTPUT
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S receiver SCK signal is an output.

enumeratedValue.name: SCK_INPUT
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S receiver SCK signal is an input.

enumeratedValue.name: SCK_OUTPUT
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S transmitter SCK signal is an output.

enumeratedValue.name: SCK_INPUT
enumeratedValue.description: The I2S transmitter SCK signal is an input.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the I2S transmitter FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the I2S receiver FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit underflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit underflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive overflow interrupt.

field.name: TXLWMIEN
field.description: Transmit FIFO Low Watermark Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit FIFO low watermark interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit FIFO low watermark interrupt.

field.name: RXHWMIEN
field.description: Receive FIFO High Watermark Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive FIFO high watermark interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive FIFO high watermark interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit underflow has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit underflow occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive overflow has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive overflow occurred.

field.name: TXLWMI
field.description: Transmit FIFO Low Watermark Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO level is above the low watermark.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO level is at or below the low watermark.

field.name: RXHWMI
field.description: Receive FIFO High Watermark Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO level is below the high watermark.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO level is at or above the high watermark.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: The divider is not busy and an update is not pending.

enumeratedValue.name: BUSY
enumeratedValue.description: The divider is busy and an update is pending.

enumeratedValue.name: RUNNING
enumeratedValue.description: Divided clock output is running.

enumeratedValue.name: HALTED
enumeratedValue.description: Divided clock output is halted.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit clock is not synchronized.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit clock is synchronized and the transmitter is ready to send data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive clock is not synchronized.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive clock is synchronized and the receiver is ready to accept data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit clock is not synchronized.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit clock is synchronized and the transmitter is ready to send data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive clock is not synchronized.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive clock is synchronized and the receiver is ready to accept data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable transmitter DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable transmitter DMA data requests.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receiver DMA data transfer requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receiver DMA data transfer requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter transmits one word at a time. Whenever there is any room in the transmit FIFO, a single word burst DMA data request is generated.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR_WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter transmits four words at a time. Whenever the FIFO depth drops below five, a DMA burst request is generated for four words.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_WORD
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver receives one word at a time. Whenever there is at least one word in the receive FIFO, a single word burst DMA request is generated.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR_WORDS
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver receives four words at a time. Whenever the FIFO depth rises above three, a DMA burst request is generated for four words.

field.name: TXDBGHEN
field.description: I2S Transmit DMA Debug Halt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit DMA requests continue while the core is debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit DMA requests stop while the core is debug mode.

field.name: RXDBGHEN
field.description: I2S Receive DMA Debug Halt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Receive DMA requests continue while the core is debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Receive DMA requests stop while the core is debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The clock to the I2S transmitter is active in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: The clock to the I2S transmitter is not active in debug mode. The clock divider keeps running and the clock will be disabled when two samples are ready to be sent by the transmitter.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The clock to the I2S receiver is active in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: The clock to the I2S receiver is not active in debug mode. The clock divider keeps running and the clock will be disabled when two samples are captured in the receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT8
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT8 (Timer 0 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT9
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT9 (Timer 1 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT10
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT10 (Timer 1 Low Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: DACNT11
enumeratedValue.description: The IDAC output updates using the DACnT11 (Timer 1 High Overflow) trigger source.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to TMRSET initiates a copy of the value from the DATA register into the internal timer register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the copy is complete and does not need to be cleared by software.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to TMRCAP initiates a read of internal timer register into the DATA register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the operation completes and does not need to be cleared by software.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to CMPSET initiates a copy of the value in DATA into the internal timer comparator register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the copy is complete and does not need to be cleared by software.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Writing a 1 to CMPCAP initiates a read of the internal comparator register into the DATA register. This field is automatically cleared by hardware when the operation completes and does not need to be cleared by software.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the timer compare event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the timer compare event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer overflows do not toggle the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer overflows toggle the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare events do not toggle the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare events toggle the Low Power Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare events do not reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Timer compare events reset the timer.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The Low Power Timer module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the Low Power Timer module to halt.

field.name: RUN
field.description: Timer Run Control and Compare Threshold Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop the timer and disable the compare threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start the timer running and enable the compare threshold.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer overflow has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer overflow occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare event has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timer compare event occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is not saturated low.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is saturated low.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is not saturated high.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO period is saturated high.

field.name: LCKI
field.description: Phase-Lock and Frequency-Lock Locked Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO is disabled or not locked.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: DCO is enabled and locked.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Saturation (high and low) interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Saturation (high and low) interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The PLL locking does not cause an interrupt

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated if LCKI matches the state selected by LCKPOL.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The lock state PLL interrupt will occur when LCKI is 0.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The lock state PLL interrupt will occur when LCKI is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: RTC0OSC
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the RTC0 oscillator (RTC0OSC).

enumeratedValue.name: LPOSC0DIV
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the divided Low Power Oscillator (LPOSC0).

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSC0
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the external oscillator output (EXTOSC0).

enumeratedValue.name: USBOSC0
enumeratedValue.description: PLL reference clock (FREF) is the USB0 oscillator (USB0OSC).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: In phase-lock and frequency-lock modes, spectrum spreading, and dithering operate normally, if enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: In phase-lock and frequency-lock modes, spectrum spreading, and dithering are prevented from updating the output of the DCO.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic DCO output dithering disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic DCO output dithering enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Lock DCO output frequency to the falling edge of the reference frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Lock DCO output frequency to the rising edge of the reference frequency.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is off.

enumeratedValue.name: DCO
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in Free-Running DCO mode.

enumeratedValue.name: FLL
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in frequency-lock mode (reference source required).

enumeratedValue.name: PLL
enumeratedValue.description: DCO output is in phase-lock mode (reference source required).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Spectrum Spreading.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING1
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.1% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING2
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.2% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING3
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.4% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING4
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 0.8% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: SETTING5
enumeratedValue.description: Spectrum Spreading set to approximately +/- 1.6% of TDCO.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE0
enumeratedValue.description: DCO operates from 23 to 37 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE1
enumeratedValue.description: DCO operates from 33 to 54 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE2
enumeratedValue.description: DCO operates from 45 to 71 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE3
enumeratedValue.description: DCO operates from 53 to 80 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE4
enumeratedValue.description: DCO operates from 73 to 80 MHz.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE0
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 0.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE1
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 1.

enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 2.

enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 3.

enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 4.

enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 5.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE6
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 6.

enumeratedValue.name: RANGE7
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator to range 7.

enumeratedValue.description: The external oscillator is unused or not yet stable.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The external oscillator is running and stable.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: External oscillator off.

enumeratedValue.name: CMOS
enumeratedValue.description: External CMOS clock mode.

enumeratedValue.name: CMOSDIV2
enumeratedValue.description: External CMOS with divide by 2 stage.

enumeratedValue.name: RC
enumeratedValue.description: RC oscillator mode with divide by 2 stage.

enumeratedValue.name: C
enumeratedValue.description: C oscillator mode with divide by 2 stage.

enumeratedValue.name: XTAL
enumeratedValue.description: Crystal oscillator mode.

enumeratedValue.name: XTALDIV2
enumeratedValue.description: Crystal oscillator mode with divide by 2 stage.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Set the APB as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: TIMER0
enumeratedValue.description: Set Timer 0 low overflows divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: HL_ECI
enumeratedValue.description: Set high-to-low transitions on ECI divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Set the external oscillator module output (EXTOSCn) divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: ECI
enumeratedValue.description: Set ECI transitions divided by 2 as the input clock (FCLKIN).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the PCA counter overflow/limit event interrupt.

enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the PCA to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The PCA will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTPUT_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The clock divider is currently in the second half-cycle.

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_ON_POR
enumeratedValue.description: The pins used by the external regulator will default to digital inputs with weak pull-up enabled only on Power-On Reset. Their configured mode will be preserved through all other resets.

enumeratedValue.description: Port Bank Configuration and Control registers are unlocked.

enumeratedValue.name: LOCKED
enumeratedValue.description: The following registers are locked from write access: CONTROL1, XBAR0L, XBAR0H, XBAR1, and all PBSKIP registers.

enumeratedValue.name: UNLOCKED

field.name: PB0SSSEL
field.description: Port Bank n.0 Safe State Select.

enumeratedValue.name: HIZ
enumeratedValue.description: Place PBn.0 in a High Impedance state.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Drive PBn.0 High.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Drive PBn.0 Low.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Ignore the safe state signal (weak pull-ups disabled).

enumeratedValue.name: DEGLITCH
enumeratedValue.description: Enable deglitching on the kill signal input. The kill signal must be asserted for two APB clocks to be recognized.

enumeratedValue.name: IMMEDIATE
enumeratedValue.description: Disable deglitching on the kill signal input. The kill signal will take immediate effect.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Start the RTC timer running.

enumeratedValue.description: Disable the missing clock detector.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

field.name: ASEN
field.description: Automatic Crystal Load Capacitance Stepping Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic load capacitance stepping.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic load capacitance stepping.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the bias doubler, saving power.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the bias doubler, allowing for faster oscillator start up time.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the crystal oscillator circuitry.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the crystal oscillator circuitry.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic gain control.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic gain control, saving power.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

field.name: RFRQI
field.description: Receive FIFO Read Request Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The RX FIFO has fewer bytes than the level defined by RFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The RX FIFO has equal or more bytes than the level defined by RFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive FIFO overrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive FIFO overrun occurred. Write: Force a receive overrun interrupt.

field.name: TFRQI
field.description: Transmit FIFO Write Request Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO has fewer bytes than the level defined by TFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO has equal or more bytes than the level defined by TFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit FIFO overrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit FIFO overrun occurred. Write: Force a transmit overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The slave select signal (NSS) is not active.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The slave select signal (NSS) is active.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A master mode collision is not detected. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A master mode collision occurred. Write: Force a mode fault interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data transfer is still in progress. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The transmit FIFO and shift register are empty and the data transfer has ended. Write: Force an underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: There is data still present in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: All data has been transferred out of the shift register and there is no data waiting in the transmit FIFO.

field.name: RFILI
field.description: Illegal Receive FIFO Access Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the receive FIFO has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the receive FIFO occurred. Write: Force an illegal receive access interrupt.

field.name: TFILI
field.description: Illegal Transmit FIFO Access Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the transmit FIFO has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the transmit FIFO occurred. Write: Force an illegal transmit access interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: NSS is currently a logic low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: NSS is currently a logic high.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI is not busy and a transfer is not in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI is currently busy and a transfer is in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the SPI module to halt.

field.name: RFRQIEN
field.description: Receive FIFO Read Request Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive FIFO request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive FIFO request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive FIFO overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive FIFO overrun interrupt.

field.name: TFRQIEN
field.description: Transmit FIFO Write Request Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit FIFO data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED

enumeratedValue.description: Flush the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: SPI module is in soft reset and some of the module bits cannot be accessed until this bit is cleared to 0 by hardware.

field.name: RFRQI
field.description: Receive FIFO Read Request Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The RX FIFO has fewer bytes than the level defined by RFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The RX FIFO has equal or more bytes than the level defined by RFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive FIFO overrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receive FIFO overrun occurred. Write: Force a receive overrun interrupt.

field.name: TFRQI
field.description: Transmit FIFO Write Request Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO has fewer bytes than the level defined by TFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO has equal or more bytes than the level defined by TFTH.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit FIFO overrun has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit FIFO overrun occurred. Write: Force a transmit overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The slave select signal (NSS) is not active.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The slave select signal (NSS) is active.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A master mode collision is not detected. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A master mode collision occurred. Write: Force a mode fault interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A data transfer is still in progress. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The transmit FIFO and shift register are empty and the data transfer has ended. Write: Force an underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: There is data still present in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: All data has been transferred out of the shift register and there is no data waiting in the transmit FIFO.

field.name: RFILI
field.description: Illegal Receive FIFO Access Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the receive FIFO has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the receive FIFO occurred. Write: Force an illegal receive access interrupt.

field.name: TFILI
field.description: Illegal Transmit FIFO Access Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the transmit FIFO has not occurred. Write: Clear the flag.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An illegal write or read of the transmit FIFO occurred. Write: Force an illegal transmit access interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: NSS is currently a logic low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: NSS is currently a logic high.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI is not busy and a transfer is not in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI is currently busy and a transfer is in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The SPI module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the SPI module to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: SPI module is not in soft reset.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: SPI module is in soft reset and some of the module bits cannot be accessed until this bit is cleared to 0 by hardware.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: The SSG module runs at normal speed, where each pulse and phase cycle consists of 16 ADC clocks.

enumeratedValue.name: DOUBLE
enumeratedValue.description: The SSG module runs at double speed, where each pulse and phase cycle consists of 8 ADC clocks.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The Phase Generator runs only when pulse generation occurs.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The Phase Generator runs when an ADC is enabled, regardless of the Pulse Generator settings.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The COUNT field determines the number of pulses generated by the Pulse Generator.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The Pulse Generator always generates pulses regardless of COUNT unless all outputs are disabled (EX0EN, EX1EN, EX2EN, and EX3EN are all 0).

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the Pulse Generator output on EX0.

enumeratedValue.name: INVERT
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the Pulse Generator output on EX0.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the Pulse Generator output on EX1.

enumeratedValue.name: INVERT
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the Pulse Generator output on EX1.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the Pulse Generator output on EX2.

enumeratedValue.name: INVERT
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the Pulse Generator output on EX2.

enumeratedValue.name: NORMAL
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the Pulse Generator output on EX3.

enumeratedValue.name: INVERT
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the Pulse Generator output on EX3.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EX0 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EX0 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EX1 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EX1 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EX2 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EX2 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the EX3 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the EX3 Pulse Generator output.

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE
enumeratedValue.description: The SSG module is idle and the Pulse Generator is not operating.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The SSG module is active and the Pulse Generator is counting.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Select the APB clock as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Select the external oscillator clock as the timer source. The external oscillator must run slower than one-half the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMER_CLKDIV
enumeratedValue.description: Select the dedicated 8-bit prescaler as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: CT_FALLING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Select falling edges of the CT signal as the timer clock source.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN does not need to be set for the low timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN must be set for the low timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The timer operates as a single 32-bit timer controlled by the high timer fields.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The timer operates as two independent 16-bit timers.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the LEXI flag does not affect the low timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A low timer interrupt request is generated if LEXI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of LOVFI does not affect the low timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A low timer interrupt request is generated if LOVFI = 1.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTO_RELOAD
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Auto-Reload Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: UP_DOWN
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Up/Down Count Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: FALL_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Falling Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RISE_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Rising Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Low Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in High Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DC_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Duty Cycle Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ONESHOT
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Oneshot Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop the low timer if split mode is enabled (SPLITEN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer runs if split mode is enabled (SPLITEN = 1) and (LMSTREN = 0 or MSTRUN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A low timer extra interrupt is not pending. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Indicates the low 16-bit timer has been captured, reloaded with all 1's when counting down, or the timer matched the capture register in PWM mode. This interrupt flag can be set by hardware in all modes except Auto-Reload and Toggle. This flag is not set by hardware when split mode is disabled (SPLITEN = 0). Write: Force a low timer extra interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A low timer overflow interrupt is not pending. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: The low 16-bit timer has wrapped or reloaded after reaching all 1's. This bit is set by the module regardless of the state of SPLITEN and can be set in all modes. Write: Force a low timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Select the APB clock as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Select the external oscillator clock as the timer source. The external oscillator must run slower than one-half the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMER_CLKDIV
enumeratedValue.description: Select the dedicated 8-bit prescaler as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: CT_FALLING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Select falling edges of the CT signal as the timer clock source.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the master run control for all timers.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the master run control for all timers.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN does not need to be set for the high timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN must be set for the high timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The Timer will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the Timer to halt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the HEXI flag does not affect the high timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A high timer interrupt request is generated if HEXI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of HOVFI does not affect the high timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A high timer interrupt request is generated if HOVFI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTO_RELOAD
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Auto-Reload Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: UP_DOWN
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Up/Down Count Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: FALL_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Falling Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RISE_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Rising Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Low Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in High Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DC_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Duty Cycle Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ONESHOT
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Oneshot Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TOGGLE
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in Toggle Output Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: PWM
enumeratedValue.description: The high 16-bit timer or entire 32-bit timer is in PWM Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop the high timer or entire 32-bit timer.

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: The high timer runs if HMSTREN = 0 or MSTRUN = 1. The full 32-bit timer runs if split mode is disabled and (HMSTREN = 0 or MSTRUN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A high timer extra interrupt is not pending. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Indicates the high 16-bit timer (or 32-bit timer if SPLITEN = 0) has been captured, reloaded with all 1's when counting down, or the timer matched the capture register in PWM mode. This interrupt flag can be set by the timer module in all modes except Auto-Reload and Toggle. Write: Force a high timer extra interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A high timer overflow interrupt is not pending. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: If split mode is enabled (SPLITEN = 1), this value indicates the high 16-bit timer has wrapped or reloaded after reaching all 1's. If split mode is disabled (SPLITEN = 0), this value indicates the 32-bit timer has wrapped or reloaded after reaching all 1's. The timer module can set this bit in all modes. Write: Force a high timer overflow interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: APB
enumeratedValue.description: Select the APB clock as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Select the external oscillator clock as the timer source. The external oscillator must run slower than one-half the APB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMER_CLKDIV
enumeratedValue.description: Select the dedicated 8-bit prescaler as the timer source.

enumeratedValue.name: CT_FALLING_EDGE
enumeratedValue.description: Select falling edges of the CT signal as the timer clock source.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN does not need to be set for the low timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: MSTRUN must be set for the low timer to run.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The timer operates as a single 32-bit timer controlled by the high timer fields.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The timer operates as two independent 16-bit timers.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the LEXI flag does not affect the low timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A low timer interrupt request is generated if LEXI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The state of LOVFI does not affect the low timer interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: A low timer interrupt request is generated if LOVFI = 1.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTO_RELOAD
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Auto-Reload Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: UP_DOWN
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Up/Down Count Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: FALL_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Falling Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RISE_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Rising Edge Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Low Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in High Time Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DC_CAPTURE
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Duty Cycle Capture Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ONESHOT
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer is in Oneshot Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Stop the low timer if split mode is enabled (SPLITEN = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: START
enumeratedValue.description: The low timer runs if split mode is enabled (SPLITEN = 1) and (LMSTREN = 0 or MSTRUN = 1).
