enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_STORED
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is stored in the FIFO (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_MATCH
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is not stored in the FIFO (fixed mode). This mode is used when the 9th bit is only used for match operations (see MATMD).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not send a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver sends a Smartcard Parity response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not operate in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_FIFO
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is taken from the FIFO data (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_TBIT
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is set by the value of TBIT (fixed mode).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter does not check for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter checks for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The UART module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the UART module to halt. Any active transmissions and receptions will complete first.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Loop back is disabled and the TX and RX signals are connected to the corresponding external pins.

enumeratedValue.name: RX_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Receive loop back. The receiver input path is disconnected from the RX pin and internally connected to the transmitter. Data transmitted will be sent out on TX and also received by the device.

enumeratedValue.name: TX_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit loop back. The transmitter output path is disconnected from the TX pin and the RX input pin is internally looped back out to the TX pin. Data received at RX will be received by the device and also sent directly back out on TX.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Full loop back. Internally, the transmitter output is routed back to the receiver input. Neither the transmitter nor receiver are connected to external device pins. The device pin RX is looped back to TX in a similar fashion. Data transmitted on TX will be sent directly back in on RX.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Full-duplex mode. The transmitter and receiver can operate simultaneously.

enumeratedValue.name: HALF_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Half-duplex mode. The transmitter automatically inhibits when the receiver is active and the receiver automatically inhibits when the transmitter is active.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX and UCLK (if in synchronous master mode) pins are always an output in this mode, even when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin is tristated when idle. If ISTCLK is cleared to 0 and the transmitter is configured in synchronous master mode, the UCLK pin will also be tristated when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART does not invert the RTS signal before driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART inverts the RTS signal driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are full and no more incoming data can be stored.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_BYTE_FREE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are nearly full and only one more data can be received.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The RTS state is not changed by hardware. The RTS bit can be written only when hardware RTS is disabled (RTSEN = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets RTS when the receive FIFO is at or above the threshold set by RTSTH and clears RTS otherwise.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART does not invert CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART inverts CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The CTS pin state does not affect transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions will begin only if the CTS pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_8TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/8th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 3_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 3/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_4TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/4th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error has not occurred since RFRMERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error occurred. Write: Force a frame error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has not been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Force a parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun has not occurred since ROREI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun occurred. Write: Force a receiver overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Fewer than RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: At least RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive error interrupt. A receive error interrupt is asserted when ROREI, RFRMERI, or RPARERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the read data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the read data request interrupt. A receive interrupt is generated when RDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the match function.

enumeratedValue.name: MCE
enumeratedValue.description: (MCE) Data whose last data bit equals RBIT is accepted and stored.

enumeratedValue.name: FRAME
enumeratedValue.description: (Frame) A framing error is asserted if the last received bit matches RBIT.

enumeratedValue.name: STORE
enumeratedValue.description: (Store) Store the last incoming data bit in RBIT. This mode can be used inconjunction with the RDATLN setting.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART receiver is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART receiver is receiving data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is immediately asserted when RINH is set. The receiver will complete any ongoing reception, but ignore all traffic after that.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receiver. The receiver can receive one data transaction only if ROSEN is set.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error has not occurred since TSCERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error occurred. Write: Force a Smartcard parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is not requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit has not completed since TCPTI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A byte was transmitted (TCCPTH = 0) or the last available byte was transmitted (TCPTTH = 1). Write: Force a transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_TX
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) at the end of each transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) only at the end of a transmission when no more data is available to transmit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit error interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TUREI or TSCERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit data request interrupt. A transmit interrupt is asserted when TDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit complete interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TCPTI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART transmitter is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART transmitter is active and transmitting.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions are inhibited. The transmitter will stall after any current transmission is complete.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmitter. When cleared, the transmitter immediately aborts any active transmission. Clearing this bit does not automatically flush the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmitter. The transmitter will initiate a transmission when data becomes available in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is full.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the receive FIFO and any data in the receive shift register.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error has not occurred since RFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the transmit FIFO. If data is pending in the transmit shift register but a transmit has not begun, the shift register is also flushed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error has not occurred since TFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_STORED
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is stored in the FIFO (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_MATCH
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is not stored in the FIFO (fixed mode). This mode is used when the 9th bit is only used for match operations (see MATMD).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not send a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver sends a Smartcard Parity response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not operate in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_FIFO
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is taken from the FIFO data (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_TBIT
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is set by the value of TBIT (fixed mode).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter does not check for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter checks for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The UART module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the UART module to halt. Any active transmissions and receptions will complete first.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Loop back is disabled and the TX and RX signals are connected to the corresponding external pins.

enumeratedValue.name: RX_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Receive loop back. The receiver input path is disconnected from the RX pin and internally connected to the transmitter. Data transmitted will be sent out on TX and also received by the device.

enumeratedValue.name: TX_ONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit loop back. The transmitter output path is disconnected from the TX pin and the RX input pin is internally looped back out to the TX pin. Data received at RX will be received by the device and also sent directly back out on TX.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Full loop back. Internally, the transmitter output is routed back to the receiver input. Neither the transmitter nor receiver are connected to external device pins. The device pin RX is looped back to TX in a similar fashion. Data transmitted on TX will be sent directly back in on RX.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Full-duplex mode. The transmitter and receiver can operate simultaneously.

enumeratedValue.name: HALF_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Half-duplex mode. The transmitter automatically inhibits when the receiver is active and the receiver automatically inhibits when the transmitter is active.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX and UCLK (if in synchronous master mode) pins are always an output in this mode, even when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin is tristated when idle. If ISTCLK is cleared to 0 and the transmitter is configured in synchronous master mode, the UCLK pin will also be tristated when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART does not invert the RTS signal before driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART inverts the RTS signal driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are full and no more incoming data can be stored.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_BYTE_FREE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are nearly full and only one more data can be received.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The RTS state is not changed by hardware. The RTS bit can be written only when hardware RTS is disabled (RTSEN = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets RTS when the receive FIFO is at or above the threshold set by RTSTH and clears RTS otherwise.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART does not invert CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The UART inverts CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The CTS pin state does not affect transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions will begin only if the CTS pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_8TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/8th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 3_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 3/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_4TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/4th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error has not occurred since RFRMERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error occurred. Write: Force a frame error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has not been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Force a parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun has not occurred since ROREI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun occurred. Write: Force a receiver overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Fewer than RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: At least RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive error interrupt. A receive error interrupt is asserted when ROREI, RFRMERI, or RPARERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the read data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the read data request interrupt. A receive interrupt is generated when RDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the match function.

enumeratedValue.name: MCE
enumeratedValue.description: (MCE) Data whose last data bit equals RBIT is accepted and stored.

enumeratedValue.name: FRAME
enumeratedValue.description: (Frame) A framing error is asserted if the last received bit matches RBIT.

enumeratedValue.name: STORE
enumeratedValue.description: (Store) Store the last incoming data bit in RBIT. This mode can be used inconjunction with the RDATLN setting.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART receiver is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART receiver is receiving data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is immediately asserted when RINH is set. The receiver will complete any ongoing reception, but ignore all traffic after that.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receiver. The receiver can receive one data transaction only if ROSEN is set.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error has not occurred since TSCERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error occurred. Write: Force a Smartcard parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is not requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit has not completed since TCPTI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A byte was transmitted (TCCPTH = 0) or the last available byte was transmitted (TCPTTH = 1). Write: Force a transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_TX
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) at the end of each transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) only at the end of a transmission when no more data is available to transmit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit error interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TUREI or TSCERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit data request interrupt. A transmit interrupt is asserted when TDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit complete interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TCPTI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART transmitter is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The UART transmitter is active and transmitting.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions are inhibited. The transmitter will stall after any current transmission is complete.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmitter. When cleared, the transmitter immediately aborts any active transmission. Clearing this bit does not automatically flush the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmitter. The transmitter will initiate a transmission when data becomes available in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is full.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the receive FIFO and any data in the receive shift register.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error has not occurred since RFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the transmit FIFO. If data is pending in the transmit shift register but a transmit has not begun, the shift register is also flushed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error has not occurred since TFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Loop back is disabled and the TX and RX signals are connected to the corresponding external pins.

enumeratedValue.name: RXONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Receive loop back. The receiver input path is disconnected from the RX pin and internally connected to the transmitter. Data transmitted will be sent out on TX and also received by the device.

enumeratedValue.name: TXONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit loop back. The transmitter output path is disconnected from the TX pin and the RX input pin is internally looped back out to the TX pin. Data received at RX will be received by the device and also sent directly back out on TX.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Full loop back. Internally, the transmitter output is routed back to the receiver input. Neither the transmitter nor receiver are connected to external device pins. The device pin RX is looped back to TX in a similar fashion. Data transmitted on TX will be sent directly back in on RX.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is not generated during stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is generated during stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is held idle during a start bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is generated during a start bit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master and CLKESEL is not equal to CLKIDLE, the clock is held idle between transmissions. When the USART is a clock master and CLKESEL equals CLKIDEL, the clock will still be generated between transmissions. When the USART is a clock slave, the USART will begin transmissions without waiting for the next clock edge.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is generated between transmissions or receptions. When the USART is a clock slave, the USART will wait until the next clock edge before transmitting.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Full-duplex mode. The transmitter and receiver can operate simultaneously.

enumeratedValue.name: HALF_DUPLEX
enumeratedValue.description: Half-duplex mode. The transmitter automatically inhibits when the receiver is active and the receiver automatically inhibits when the transmitter is active.

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE_LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The synchronous clock is low when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The synchronous clock is high when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: The clock falls in the middle of each bit.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: The clock rises in the middle of each bit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX and UCLK (if in synchronous master mode) pins are always an output in this mode, even when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin is tristated when idle. If ISTCLK is cleared to 0 and the transmitter is configured in synchronous master mode, the UCLK pin will also be tristated when idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SLAVE
enumeratedValue.description: The USART operates as a slave.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER
enumeratedValue.description: The USART operates as a master.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RTS pin (before optional inversion) is driven high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: RX pin (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The USART does not invert the RTS signal before driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The USART inverts the RTS signal driving the pin.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are full and no more incoming data can be stored.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE_BYTE_FREE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is de-asserted when the receive FIFO and shift register are nearly full and only one more data can be received.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The RTS state is not changed by hardware. The RTS bit can be written only when hardware RTS is disabled (RTSEN = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware sets RTS when the receive FIFO is at or above the threshold set by RTSTH and clears RTS otherwise.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates the CTS pin state (after optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The TX pin (before optional inversion) is high.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: The UCLK pin is low.

enumeratedValue.name: HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: The UCLK pin is high.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The USART does not invert CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The USART inverts CTS.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The CTS pin state does not affect transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions will begin only if the CTS pin (after optional inversion) is low.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_8TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/8th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 3_16TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 3/16th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_4TH
enumeratedValue.description: The IrDA pulse width is 1/4th of a bit period.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error has not occurred since RFRMERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A frame error occurred. Write: Force a frame error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has not been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: An invalid parity bit has been received since RPARERI was last cleared. Write: Force a parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun has not occurred since ROREI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A receiver overrun occurred. Write: Force a receiver overrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Fewer than RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: At least RFTH FIFO slots are filled with data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receive error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receive error interrupt. A receive error interrupt is asserted when ROREI, RFRMERI, or RPARERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the read data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the read data request interrupt. A receive interrupt is generated when RDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the match function.

enumeratedValue.name: MCE
enumeratedValue.description: (MCE) Data whose last data bit equals RBIT is accepted and stored.

enumeratedValue.name: FRAME
enumeratedValue.description: (Frame) A framing error is asserted if the last received bit matches RBIT.

enumeratedValue.name: STORE
enumeratedValue.description: (Store) Store the last incoming data bit in RBIT. This mode can be used inconjunction with the RDATLN setting.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receiver auto-baud.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART receiver is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART receiver is receiving data.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is immediately asserted when RINH is set. The receiver will complete any ongoing reception, but ignore all traffic after that.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receiver. The receiver can receive one data transaction only if ROSEN is set.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error has not occurred since TSCERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error occurred. Write: Force a Smartcard parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmitter underrun has not occurred since TUREI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmitter underrun occurred. Write: Force a transmitter underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is not requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit has not completed since TCPTI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A byte was transmitted (TCCPTH = 0) or the last available byte was transmitted (TCPTTH = 1). Write: Force a transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_TX
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) at the end of each transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) only at the end of a transmission when no more data is available to transmit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit error interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TUREI or TSCERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit data request interrupt. A transmit interrupt is asserted when TDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit complete interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TCPTI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART transmitter is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART transmitter is active and transmitting.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions are inhibited. The transmitter will stall after any current transmission is complete.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmitter. When cleared, the transmitter immediately aborts any active transmission. Clearing this bit does not automatically flush the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmitter. The transmitter will initiate a transmission when data becomes available in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is full.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQ) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receive FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receive FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the receive FIFO and any data in the receive shift register.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error has not occurred since RFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQ) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable transmit FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable transmit FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the transmit FIFO. If data is pending in the transmit shift register but a transmit has not begun, the shift register is also flushed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error has not occurred since TFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a start bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect a parity bit during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Expect stop bits during receptions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_STORED
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is stored in the FIFO (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_MATCH
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is not stored in the FIFO (fixed mode). This mode is used when the 9th bit is only used for match operations (see MATMD).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not send a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver sends a Smartcard parity response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver does not operate in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates in IrDA mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the RX pin signals (the RX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates in asynchronous mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates in synchronous mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Generate a start bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send a parity bit during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Send stop bits during transmissions.

enumeratedValue.name: 0P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 0.5 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1 stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: 1P5_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 1.5 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 2_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: 2 stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ODD
enumeratedValue.description: Odd Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: EVEN
enumeratedValue.description: Even Parity.

enumeratedValue.name: MARK
enumeratedValue.description: Set (Parity = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: SPACE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear (Parity = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: 5_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 5 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 6_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 6 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 7_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 7 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 8_BITS
enumeratedValue.description: 8 bits.

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_FIFO
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is taken from the FIFO data (normal mode).

enumeratedValue.name: 9_BITS_TBIT
enumeratedValue.description: 9 bits. The 9th bit is set by the value of TBIT (fixed mode).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter does not check for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter checks for a Smartcard parity error response.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable IrDA transmit mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is high).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Invert the TX pin signals (the TX idle state is low).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates in asynchronous mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates in synchronous mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The USART module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will cause the USART module to halt. Any active transmissions and receptions will complete first.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Loop back is disabled and the TX and RX signals are connected to the corresponding external pins.

enumeratedValue.name: RXONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Receive loop back. The receiver input path is disconnected from the RX pin and internally connected to the transmitter. Data transmitted will be sent out on TX and also received by the device.

enumeratedValue.name: TXONLY
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit loop back. The transmitter output path is disconnected from the TX pin and the RX input pin is internally looped back out to the TX pin. Data received at RX will be received by the device and also sent directly back out on TX.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Full loop back. Internally, the transmitter output is routed back to the receiver input. Neither the transmitter nor receiver are connected to external device pins. The device pin RX is looped back to TX in a similar fashion. Data transmitted on TX will be sent directly back in on RX.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is not generated during stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is generated during stop bits.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is held idle during a start bit.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: When the USART is a clock master, the clock is generated during a start bit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable one-shot receive mode.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The receiver operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: RTS is immediately asserted when RINH is set. The receiver will complete any ongoing reception, but ignore all traffic after that.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the receiver. The receiver can receive one data transaction only if ROSEN is set.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the receiver.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error has not occurred since TSCERI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A Smartcard parity error occurred. Write: Force a Smartcard parity error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmitter underrun has not occurred since TUREI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmitter underrun occurred. Write: Force a transmitter underrun interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is not requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter is requesting more FIFO data.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A transmit has not completed since TCPTI was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A byte was transmitted (TCCPTH = 0) or the last available byte was transmitted (TCPTTH = 1). Write: Force a transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_TX
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) at the end of each transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: SET_ON_EMPTY
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit is completed (TCPTI = 1) only at the end of a transmission when no more data is available to transmit.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit error interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TUREI or TSCERI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit data request interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit data request interrupt. A transmit interrupt is asserted when TDREQI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmit complete interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmit complete interrupt. A transmit interrupt is generated when TCPTI is set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART transmitter is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USART transmitter is active and transmitting.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: The transmitter operates normally.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Transmissions are inhibited. The transmitter will stall after any current transmission is complete.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the transmitter. When cleared, the transmitter immediately aborts any active transmission. Clearing this bit does not automatically flush the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the transmitter. The transmitter will initiate a transmission when data becomes available in the transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is full.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or read data request interrupt (RDREQ) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are full.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable receive FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable receive FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the receive FIFO and any data in the receive shift register.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error has not occurred since RFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A receive FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The receive data shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: ONE
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 1 FIFO slot is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: TWO
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQI) is asserted when >= 2 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: FOUR
enumeratedValue.description: A DMA request or transmit data request interrupt (TDREQ) is asserted when >= 4 FIFO slots are empty.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable transmit FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable transmit FIFO DMA requests.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the contents of the transmit FIFO. If data is pending in the transmit shift register but a transmit has not begun, the shift register is also flushed.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error has not occurred since TFERI was last cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A transmit FIFO error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is not full.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The transmit shift register is full.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The last address written to FADDR is in effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The last address written to FADDR is not yet in effect.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable suspend detection. The USB module will ignore suspend signaling on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable suspend detection. The USB module will enter suspend mode if it detects suspend signalling on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module is not in suspend mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module is in suspend mode.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Reset signaling is not present on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Reset signaling detected on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: INACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the USB module.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValue.description: USB module inhibited. All USB traffic is ignored.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable automatic USB dithering.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable automatic USB dithering.

enumeratedValue.name: SEND_ON_IN
enumeratedValue.description: When software writes IPRDYI = 1, USB will send the packet when the next IN token is received.

enumeratedValue.name: SEND_ON_SOF
enumeratedValue.description: When software writes IPRDYI = 1, USB will wait for a SOF token before sending the packet. If an IN token is received before a SOF token, USB will send a zero-length data packet.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Endpoint 0 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Endpoint 0 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 1 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 1 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 2 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 3 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 3 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 4 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: IN Endpoint 4 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 1 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 1 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 2 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 2 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 3 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 3 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 4 interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: OUT Endpoint 4 interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Suspend interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Suspend interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Resume interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Resume interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Reset interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: Reset interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: SOF interrupt has not occurred. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: SOF interrupt occurred. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.description: Disable the Endpoint 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the Endpoint 0 interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Endpoint 0 (no NACK, ACK, or STALL on the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Endpoint 0 (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Endpoint 1 (no NACK, ACK, or STALL on the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Endpoint 1 (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Endpoint 2 (no NACK, ACK, or STALL on the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Endpoint 2 (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Endpoint 3 (no NACK, ACK, or STALL on the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Endpoint 3 (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable Endpoint 4 (no NACK, ACK, or STALL on the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable Endpoint 4 (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not freeze the USB oscillator output frequency (closed loop mode).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Freeze the USB oscillator output frequency (open loop mode).

enumeratedValue.name: FULL_SPEED
enumeratedValue.description: Full Speed Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: LOW_SPEED
enumeratedValue.description: Low Speed Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Normal calibration mode.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Single step mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable clock recovery.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable clock recovery.

enumeratedValue.name: LOGIC_0
enumeratedValue.description: D- signal currently at logic 0.

enumeratedValue.name: LOGIC_1
enumeratedValue.description: D- signal currently at logic 1.

enumeratedValue.name: LOGIC_0
enumeratedValue.description: D+ signal currently at logic 0.

enumeratedValue.name: LOGIC_1
enumeratedValue.description: D+ signal currently at logic 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DIFF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Differential 0 signalling is present on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: DIFF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Differential 1 signalling is present on the bus.

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 0: Normal (non-test mode) (D+ = X, D- = X).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 1: Differential 1 Forced (D+ = 1, D- = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 2: Differential 0 Forced (D+ = 0, D- = 1).

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: Mode 3: Single-Ended 0 Forced (D+ = 0, D- = 0).

enumeratedValue.name: LOW_SPEED
enumeratedValue.description: USB operates as a Low Speed device. If enabled, the internal pull-up resistor appears on the D- line.

enumeratedValue.name: FULL_SPEED
enumeratedValue.description: USB operates as a Full Speed device. If enabled, the internal pull-up resistor appears on the D+ line.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the USB physical layer Transceiver (suspend).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the USB physical layer Transceiver (normal).

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the internal pull-up resistor (device effectively detached from the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the internal pull-up resistor when VBUS is present (device is attached to the USB network).

enumeratedValue.name: USBNOSC
enumeratedValue.description: Select the USB Oscillator as the USB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: PLLNOSC
enumeratedValue.description: Select the PLL output as the USB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: EXTOSCN
enumeratedValue.description: Select the External Oscillator output (EXTOSCn) as the USB clock.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV1
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module uses the selected input clock divided by 1.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV2
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module uses the selected input clock divided by 2.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV4
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module uses the selected input clock divided by 4.

enumeratedValue.name: DIV8
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module uses the selected input clock divided by 8.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Do not reset the USB module.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Reset the USB module.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The USB oscillator is not suspended.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Suspend the USB oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the USB oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the USB oscillator.

field.name: FINEFADJ
field.description: USB Oscillator Fine Output Frequency Adjust.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable USB oscillator dithering.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable USB oscillator dithering.

enumeratedValue.name: RUN
enumeratedValue.description: The USB module will continue to operate while the core is halted in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT
enumeratedValue.description: A debug breakpoint will prevent the USB DMA buffer from transferring data to and from the USB FIFOs when the core is halted.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timeout error has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A timeout error occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA buffer is not busy.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The DMA buffer is busy reading or writing an 8-word packet.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the USB DMA buffer.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A packet is not available.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A packet is available.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: A packet is not ready for transmission to host.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A packet is ready for transmission to host.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A STALL handshake has not been sent or is cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: STALL handshake sent. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The current packet is not the last packet of the transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The current packet is the last packet of the transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The current packet is not the last packet of setup.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The current packet is the last packet of setup.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The STALL handshake has been transmitted or not triggered.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Initiate a STALL condition.

field.name: OPRDYIS
field.description: Serviced Out Packet Ready Interrupt Flag.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The out packet has not been processed.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The out packet has been received and accepted.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Setup end has not been serviced.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Setup end has been serviced.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The packet has been sent or there is an open FIFO slot.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: A packet is loaded in the FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: The IN Endpoint FIFO is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: The IN Endpoint FIFO contains one or more packets.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Underrun has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Underrun occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the IN FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Stop sending a stall.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Generate a stall.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stall condition has not been sent since this bit was last cleared. Write: Clear the interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: SET
enumeratedValue.description: Read: A stall condition has been sent since this bit was last cleared. Write: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_RESET
enumeratedValue.description: Do not reset the IN data toggle.

enumeratedValue.name: RESET
enumeratedValue.description: Reset the IN data toggle.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Do not split the endpoint FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Split the endpoint FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The endpoint data toggle switches only when an ACK is received following a data packet transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The endpoint data toggle is forced to switch after every data packet is transmitted, regardless of ACK reception.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Disable the DMA request for the IN endpoint.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Enable the DMA request for the IN endpoint.

enumeratedValue.name: OUT
enumeratedValue.description: Select the endpoint direction as OUT.

enumeratedValue.name: IN
enumeratedValue.description: Select the endpoint direction as IN.

enumeratedValue.name: BULK_INT
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the endpoint for Bulk/Interrupt transfers.

enumeratedValue.name: ISO
enumeratedValue.description: Configure the endpoint for Isochronous transfers.

field.name: AUTOSETEN
field.description: IN Endpoint IPRDYI Automatic Set Enable.

enumeratedValue.description: The IPRDYI bit is not automatically set by hardware.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: The IPRDYI bit is automatically set by hardware.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_RESET
